function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus concentration below the limit of detection of the assay","Impact":"Potential false-negative results in virus detection","Mitigation":"Use of assays with lower limit of detection or concentration techniques to improve detection sensitivity","Technologies":"Improved PCR assays, concentration methods","People":"Laboratory personnel, patients, public health","Owner":"Laboratory personnel, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate thermal treatment for virus inactivation","Impact":"Risk of virus transmission during sample manipulation","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate thermal treatment methods to ensure virus inactivation without affecting RNA integrity","Technologies":"Appropriate thermal treatment equipment and protocols","People":"Laboratory personnel, patients, public health","Owner":"Laboratory personnel, public health authorities"}]}
